subject: Flock pole and camera specs
body:
[EXTERNAL ?]

Hi Detective DeWitt,

See attached for the camera and pole specs. Flock will manage the installation of any poles, and we require customer sign off on exact location before we put anything in the ground. If someone wants to avoid a pole going in landscaping, we can simply find another location.

For our HOA and commercial customers, it comes with one sign per Flock camera. Any additional signs are $30/each. 
	
 
Caroline Fraher
Account Executive



 https://www.instagram.com/flocksafety/ 

 <https://gifo.srv.wisestamp.com/s/rfcustom/108062/26/trans.png>  caroline.fraher@flocksafety.com caroline.fraher@flocksafety.com 

	
 https://www.flocksafety.com/articles/flock-safety-secures-major-funding?utm_campaign=EmailSignature&utm_source=LETSM&utm_medium=Wisestamp 

	
 

	
 	 
 <https://tracy.srv.wisestamp.com/px/wsid/LqYnr2GL2QLy.png>
